::: {.minipage data-latex="{\textwidth}"}
## `GetPlotBackgroundImageEffect`

Returns the effect applied to an image\index{images!effects} when drawn as a graph's background for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ImageEffect GetPlotBackgroundImageEffect()
```

### Return value {-}

Type: [`ImageEffect`](#imageeffect)
:::
